document_data.caption: A map showing Grimwald's Way and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Grimwald's Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Grimwald's Way''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Grimwald's Way was located in the northwestern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The road originated on [[Westwall Street]] in front of the [[Seawatch Tower]] where it branched due east, cutting southeast at the junction with the [[Street of Whispers]]. [[Seawatch Street]] intersected the eastern half of Grimwald's Way.
